title: Pattern With Uncompleted Lace (Belgium), late 19th century
medium:
Medium: paper, wool, linen
Technique: needle lace with ground of loop & twist with loop & twist return
description: Outlining thread is couched on pattern in design of a rose with bud and leaf, and a small 5 petalled flower with leaves. Part of the ground has been worked.

tombstone.epitaph:
Pattern With Uncompleted Lace (Belgium), late 19th century. Medium: paper, wool, linen
Technique: needle lace with ground of loop & twist with loop & twist return. 
1939-19-10.
